title: Personal Portfolio
description: This is the site that you're currently on!
Contains some of my highlighted projects along with what I hope will become a

title: Workout Tracking App
description: A flutter app that is meant to allow users to track their weightlifting
workouts and see how they progress over time, most features still under
construction, but the basic tracking of weight and reps is included, see the
read me on github for full progress.

title: Snip to clipboard
description: A set of three python scripts that act as a snip tool, text extractor from
an image, and an all in one command. Still WIP for better usability but works
well enough for a single display. Note that there are some hard coded
adjustments so that it works on the notched macbook display.

title: Discord Reminder Bot
description: A bot built in go that sends reminders about daily tasks in a
users personal discord server. Still WIP and scope of the project
will likely change once the basics are working as expected.

title: CHIP-8 interpreter
description: A WIP interpreter/emulator that is meant to run CHIP-8 programs.
Currently in the process of debugging this and then will work on an 8080 or 6502 emulator.
